description:
Yukino hires three specialists from the St. Pierre branch in Kyushu who are able to copy any kind of bread. Can Kazuma’s Black Ja-pan counter their threat and expose Yukino for the villain she is?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Close Attack!! The Birth of Black Ja-pan!
Attaque ! La naissance du black ja-pan !
ประชิดจู่โจม! กำเนิดแบล็คเจปัง!
迫撃!! ブラックじゃぱん誕生!
